name: Snake Twins
description:
Back of the box description:

The Snake brothers must compete in an epic contest for who is the best hunter. The one who collects to most or is the last Snake standing will win. Only the best

Snake can be THE BOSS!

Real description:

Snake Twins is a local multiplayer game of snake. Created for the 2015 #duplicade game jam.

You can find more info about the jam here: http://itch.io/jam/duplicade
